A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointed in this movie\, maybe the weakest in the entire series and that's saying something. The characterization of Luke Skywalker was terrible\, all the mystery surrounding Rey and Snoke is revealed to be literally nothing (which is fine\, but then the mystery didn't need to exist in the first place)\, no Kights of Ren\, Benicio Del Toro's character was pointless\, Phasma gets no redemption from TFA and goes out in an embarrassing fashion\, Finn and Rose's subplot drags and serves no real purpose\, and the stakes for the entire movie feel incredibly small.
